lines.text: Some kind of hologram. Probably a spell cast by a wizard...
I should see if I can find a <c=#FF00FF>spellbook</c> to tell me the details.
It's a hologram.
It... looks a lot like what that book on Stop Wizardry said about the <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c> spell.
(I should talk to Leo and see if I can draw a connection.)
It's a Living Memory illusion, showing a snapshot of the past. Looks like it's Slick Emmup, firing his gun at around where that wizard is lying dead.
Wonder what that could possibly mean.
Huh. This guy looks familiar…
You've probably seen the wanted posters. His name is Slick Emmup, and he's got six counts of armed robbery on his head.
And now he's... a ghost? Shouldn't you have called-
The Ghostbusters aren't real, Seeker.
(They're real... in my heart!)
And anyway, no. This is some kind of... hologram, or something. You're the wizard, you figure it out.
But, um, yeah, I think I've heard something about these...
(This is definitely some kind of <c=#FF00FF>spell effect</c>- a <c=#FF00FF>spellbook</c> might jog my memory on the details.)
(This looks like what the Stop Wizardry spellbook said about <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c>.)
(I should talk to Leo and see if I can draw a connection.)
It’s a <c=#0000FF>Living Memory</c> spell. We already went over what that whole situation’s about.
Looks like Slick here was firing a gun, at…
At the other dead guy, yep.
Gee, I wonder what the cause of death was.
